message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the money loses value for you quickly. This is a good deal.
I need a bit more due to inflation!
Bob, this is the best you'll get.  Inflation is only going to hurt you more. Let's wrap this up.
Inflation is a factor, I need a bigger share!
Bob, I'm trying to be reasonable, but this is the final offer. Take it or leave it.
